narrative.title: 4Th Indian Division - 1941Q3
narrative.situation: British Indian Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1941Q3.
narrative.objectives: Veteran Indian infantry division conducting defensive and limited offensive operations in Western Desert. Dispersed operations with brigades attached to other formations during Q3 1941.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.
